text:
@GOP @realDonaldTrump According to @JohnsHopkins we have at least 3.7 million COVID19 cases and more than 140,000 deaths. There are 18 states experiencing massive spikes on cases. Why are Republicans so set on making that worse not better? #TrumpVirus #RepublicansAreTheProblem 
https://t.co/WzxtWWfbN4

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
